title: [MAINTENANCE] 3rd Oct 2018 - Ranked Queues will be disabled due to network maintenance
body:
Hi folks

This is just a quick heads up to let you know we'll have Ranked Queues down tonight, as there will be some core network maintenance on infrastructure which is shared between the Oceanic and North America regions.  This maintenance is not expected to cause any dramas, but we will disable Ranked games at the time, just to be certain.

Here's what you need to know:

 * Ranked Queues will go down at 10:30pm AEST (3rd Oct)
 * Maintenance will start at approximately midnight
 * We expect it to last approximately 5 hours.

We'll bring Ranked back online as soon as maintenance is complete and we've verified everything is stable.

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: Are you guys thick? Like seriously who puts a game into maintenance at 10pm?

>maintenance on infrastructure which is shared between the Oceanic **and North America**

Given that North America is a larger region than us by a very significant degree, it's not surprising they get priority here.

Hi Pece,

It does suck, however we do try and keep this type of maintenance which is split between multiple regions to a minimum.  

What is key in a decision like this is the spread of time-zones means there really isn't an optimum time for everyone.  Unfortunately for this particular work, the regions affected spanned everything from Australia to New York, and we have to take into account players from so many places.

EG in this case we had:

 * AEST / SYDNEY: 10:30pm ranked off, for maintenance until ***5am***
 * EST / New York: 8:30am ranked off, for maintenance lasting until ***3pm***

Now, while you could say that its worse to have it start at 10:30pm, what is also factored in is the duration of the maintenance, and the possibility for ongoing problems as a result.  Because of this, moving it any later could put the afternoon in NA at risk.

I hope this helps explain it a little.  If you have any questions let me know!

Cheers
Mindstar

What Kind? Of Maintainence. Does, This Infrastructure Mean? What Kind of maintanence is Network core maintanence 
Will it improve my ques and prevent leavers? thank you 
{{sticker:sona-playing}}  Riot Enthusiast
